imdb.title: Yama no Susume
imdb.plot: As a child, Aoi Yukimura adored mountains and was passionate about climbing. However, a playground accident has since left her afraid of heights, turning her toward indoor hobbies. Unfortunately, now a shy and timid first-year hig...

episodes.title: First Date at Mt. Tsukuba!?
episodes.plot: Wanting to repay Hinata for the souvenir she got her from Mt. Fuji, Aoi invites her for a late night climb up Mt. Tsukuba to treat her to a night view at the top. Arriving at the top, Aoi resolves to once again take on Mt. Fuji.

episodes.title: Are Hiking Shoes Really Awesome?
episodes.plot: Finding out that she won't be able to take on Mt. Fuji again until next summer, Aoi goes with Hinata and Kaede to look for hiking shoes.

episodes.title: Alps in Hanno!?
episodes.plot: Aoi decides to climb the Hanno Alps.

episodes.title: Having Fun with Classmates!
episodes.plot: Aoi is approached by her classmate Mio and invites her and Hinata to karaoke alongside her friends Kasumi and Yuri.

episodes.title: Let's Photograph Our Memories!
episodes.plot: Aoi, Hinata, Kokona, and Honoka go to Lockheart Castle in Gunma, each bringing their own unique cameras to take pictures of everything.

episodes.title: What Does Coffee Taste Like?
episodes.plot: Hearing about "mountain coffee" from Hinata's father, Aoi, feeling provoked by Hinata, becomes determined to try it as well, despite finding coffee bitter.

episodes.title: She Who Does Not Work, Neither Shall She Climb?!
episodes.plot: With Aoi busy at her part-time job, Hinata goes on an outing by herself, finding herself lonely without Aoi.

episodes.title: Two Promises
episodes.plot: Aoi makes plans to go to Gunma with Honoka while Hinata, unable to get in touch with Aoi, ends up making plans to go to Mt. Akagi with Kokona on the same day.

episodes.title: Everyone's Own Views
episodes.plot: Aoi and Honoka explore Gunma's shrines and go to a hot spring while Hinata and Kokona reach the peak of Mt. Akagi.

episodes.title: Season of Misunderstandings
episodes.plot: Following more misunderstandings, Aoi goes to Ikebukuro with Mio, Kasumi, and Yuri while Hinata joins Kaede and Yuuka as they study for college.

episodes.title: A Clumsy Traversal
episodes.plot: As Kaede invites everyone on a camping trip across Mt. Mizugaki and Mt. Kinpu, Hinata starts to become hostile towards Aoi upon hearing she spent the night preparing food with Kokona. While acting stubborn and going against Aoi's suggestions of taking a safer route, Hinata secretly injures her knee.

episodes.title: Friends
episodes.plot: While trekking up Mt. Kinpu, Hinata becomes overwhelmed by her knee injury, prompting Aoi to stay with her and escort her back to camp. Along the way, Hinata reveals that she was worried Aoi would drift away from her to spend time with other friends.

episodes.title: It's a Secret, Right?
episodes.plot: Tasked with choosing a present for Hinata's birthday, Aoi has trouble figuring out what Hinata would like.

episodes.title: Let's Camp Overnight in a Tent!
episodes.plot: Hinata teaches Aoi how to pitch up a tent for a camping sleepover with Kaede and Kokona in Hinata's garden. After eating dinner and taking turns in Hinata's bath, the girls spend time in the tent having all sorts of conversations.

episodes.title: Let's Go See Mount Fuji!
episodes.plot: Inspired by her sunrise talk with Aoi, Hinata gets Kaede and Kokona together to come up with a way to surprise Aoi with a direct view of Mt. Fuji.

episodes.title: Climbing the Mountain
episodes.plot: After accidentally stumbling upon a view of Mt. Fuji herself, Aoi tries to keep it a secret from the others as they carry on up the mountain. With the path becoming tougher to climb, Aoi struggles but receives encouragement from Kaede.

episodes.title: The Fun After The Climb!
episodes.plot: After reaching the summit and having lunch, the girls make plans to go to a hot spring after their descent.

episodes.title: I Won't Forgive You!
episodes.plot: Aoi becomes angry with Hinata after she accidentally pulls her skirt down and later ruins something she was knitting, refusing to talk to her the next day.

episodes.title: In Order to Do What You Love
episodes.plot: After hearing from Hinata's father about how he watched the sunrise from atop a mountain during high school, Aoi decides she wants to climb Mt. Fuji at night. Finding a down jacket to be too expensive, Aoi tries to borrow one from her mother, only for her to refuse to let Aoi go climbing out of concern for her safety.

episodes.title: Encouragement of Swim?
episodes.plot: Hinata takes Aoi to visit Azuma Gorge, suggesting they invite Kaede and Kokona along to go swimming in ''sexy'' swimsuits. Aoi, who only has her school swimsuit, tries to pick out a swimsuit for herself.

episodes.title: Make Lovely Memories
episodes.plot: The girls make their preparations for the Mt. Fuji climb, with Kaede advising the girls to bring plenty of snacks to fuel themselves. After buying some snacks with Hinata and Kokona, Aoi starts to become nervous if she'll be able to climb Mt. Fuji.

episodes.title: Nice to Meet You, Mt. Fuji!
episodes.plot: Arriving at Mt. Fuji's fifth station, the girls take some time to get some lunch and explore the stores before beginning their ascent. As they continue to progress, the climb gets progressively harder and Aoi starts feeling more and more tired, but remains determined to see the climb through.

episodes.title: Mt. Fuji Is Not Easy...
episodes.plot: As the girls approach the 8th station, Aoi is overcome by tiredness and headaches from pushing herself too hard. Believing Aoi has developed altitude sickness, Kaede decides to stay behind to look after her while Hinata and Kokona go on ahead.

episodes.title: I've Had Enough!!
episodes.plot: Hinata and Kokona manage to reach the summit in time to watch the sunrise. Aoi feels frustrated that she wasn't able to make it to the summit herself.

episodes.title: Dear My Friend
episodes.plot: As summer vacation begins, Aoi remains depressed from her failure, with Hinata unsure about how to help her. Upon receiving some postcards Hinata and Kokona sent her from Mt. Fuji's summit, Aoi decides to take a walk up Mt. Ternran, the first mountain she climbed with Hinata.

episodes.title: The Tale of the Mysterious Firefly
episodes.plot: After being invited to go firefly watching by Kokona, Aoi and Hinata recall that they once went firefly watching when they were younger. When they ended up getting lost, they were led back to their parents by an alleged firefly, though they both have different ideas about what kind of firefly it was.

episodes.title: Mt. Kirigamine with Mom!
episodes.plot: With Aoi's mother still cautious about her climbing up mountains again, Hinata and her father suggest that she invite her to climb Mount Kirigamine with them. Whilst climbing the mountain, Aoi is reminded of the mountain she climbed with Hinata when they were younger, though neither can remember which mountain it was.

episodes.title: Raincoat Memories
episodes.plot: Upon finding an old raincoat in her closet, Kaede recalls her middle school friend, Yuuka, who was often concerned about her climbing mountains.

episodes.title: Inheriting Thoughts
episodes.plot: Aoi is anxious about climbing Mount Tanigawa as it involves riding a cable car, which isn't good for her fear of heights. Later, Kaede invites the girls to her house, where she explains she too was scared whilst riding a cable car, but found it less scary on her second go.

episodes.title: Can You Handle Heights Fine?
episodes.plot: Wanting to help Aoi get over her fear of heights, Hinata takes everyone to Shinrin Park.

episodes.title: I'm Starting a Part-Time Job!
episodes.plot: Running low on funds for her mountaineering, Aoi applies for a part-time job at a cake shop.

episodes.title: The Homework's Unending!
episodes.plot: Having made much progress in her preparations for the Mt. Tanigawa trip, it soon dawns on Aoi that she hasn't touched her summer homework. With Hinata on vacation, Aoi asks Kaede to help her out.

episodes.title: Kokona's Big Hanno Adventure
episodes.plot: On the day before the Tanigawa climb, Kokona, whose birthday is on the same day, gets some new shoes as an early present from her mother and decides to go on a walk to Akebono Children's Forest Park to try them out.

episodes.title: To the Mountain of Memories
episodes.plot: The day of the Mount Tanigawa climb finally arrives, with Hinata also pondering what will happen after she and Aoi fulfill their dream. After a series of staircases and some obligatory forms, the girls arrive at Tanigawa, where Aoi must face the cable car first hand.

episodes.title: Can We Be Friends?
episodes.plot: As the girls start climbing up the mountain, they encounter a quiet young photographer named Honoka, who had previously helped them by the cable car. Interested in her, Aoi decides to follow Honoka as she goes about her photography.

episodes.title: The Promise
episodes.plot: The girls have Honoka join them for dinner, where they celebrate Kokona's birthday together. Later that night, Honoka gives some advice to Aoi concerning her promise. The next morning, as the girls continue their ascent, Aoi and Hinata look back on their recent adventures as they finally watch the sunrise together.

episodes.title: Farewell To Our Summer
episodes.plot: On the day the Aoi invites Honoka to join her and the others for a fireworks festival, she and Hinata get into an argument with each other. As Aoi takes Honoka on a tour of Hanno, she can't stop thinking about Hinata and decides to try to make up with her, while Hinata hear how Aoi feels about her from Hikari and decides she should apologize too.

episodes.title: Encouragement of Bra?
episodes.plot: Learning that Kaede has been wearing nothing but sports bras, the girls go to the department store to buy her a proper bra.

episodes.title: Yama no Susume: Best Ten! Special
episodes.plot: Aoi and Hinata host a countdown of their top ten favorite scenes from the series, none of which are portrayed accurately.

episodes.title: Anything But Mountains!
episodes.plot: In the city of Hanno, Aoi Yukimura, a girl who has difficulty socializing with her classmates, is approached by her childhood friend, Hinata Kuraue, who invites her to go mountain climbing like they used to. Despite having a fear of heights, Aoi is reluctantly dragged by Hinata to her house to plan a mountaineering expedition.

episodes.title: Let's Go Together
episodes.plot: As Aoi recalls how she developed her fear of heights after falling off of a jungle gym, she meets with Hinata's father, who shows them how to put up a tent.

episodes.title: Mountain Climbing Is Dangerous!?
episodes.plot: Deciding to climb the nearby Mt. Tenran, Aoi prepares thoroughly for the mountaineering trip only to learn that she simply has to walk up the visitor's path.

episodes.title: Showdown! Mountain Cooking!?
episodes.plot: Having been impressed by Aoi's sandwiches, Hinata proposes they hold a cooking contest using camping equipment.

episodes.title: What's a Schlafsack?
episodes.plot: While browsing a mountaineering store, Aoi meets backpacker Kaede Saito, who asks for her help in picking out a sleeping bag.

episodes.title: I'm the One Deciding!?
episodes.plot: Goaded by Hinata into picking their next mountaineering destination, Aoi asks Kaede for advice.

episodes.title: Which Daypack Do You Want?
episodes.plot: While preparing for their climb up Mount Takao, the girls go to the mountaineering store to buy a backpack for Aoi.

episodes.title: Let's Climb Mt. Takao!
episodes.plot: Upon beginning their ascent up Mount Takao, Aoi's excitement to visit the various wishing spots gets the better of her as she quickly tires out from not pacing herself.

episodes.title: A Forest Girl in the Forest!?
episodes.plot: The girls finally arrive at the summit and take in a view of Mount Fuji before Aoi gives Hinata her souvenir. Taking a different path back down the mountain, the girls come across a girl, Kokona Aoba, and help mend her broken shoe before having her join them on their descent.

episodes.title: The Climb Isn't Over Until You Descend!?
episodes.plot: Coming across some stepping stones going over a river along their trail, the three girls hold hands all the way to the exit.

episodes.title: Tomorrow Is Outdoors!
episodes.plot: As Summer arrives, the girls make plans to go to Hanno River Beach together. While Hinata and Kaede shop for ingredients for the trip, Aoi invites Kokona over for a sleepover, where they decide to prepare French toast for the outing.

episodes.title: To the Next Landscape
episodes.plot: The girls arrive at the beach, where Kokona prepares tomato risotto from the ingredients Hinata and Kaede bought. After spending the day having fun, the girls take a look at the stars, becoming excited over the thought of seeing even more of them while mountain climbing.

episodes.title: Encouragement of Climb Special
episodes.plot: Hinata invites Kokona and a reluctant Aoi to try out indoor climbing. The girls run into Kaede who offers to teach them how to ascend the climbing wall.
